html:
2.2.24  7:38 pm   what is the title for your next song?

     i can't tell you

     also, where do you get the inspiration for your songs from?

      everywhere. that may sound overwhelming, and, yes it is overwhelming

2.2.24  7:30 pm   do you think 2024 will be the year ever?

      it is now currently the year. the current year is in fact the year you mentioned

2.2.24  4:19 pm   Opinion on starbucks

      iconically ironic, or, dare i say, ironically iconic

2.2.24  2:54 pm   I would write poems, but I dont really know how, can you help me out?

      poetry is when you write things anyway, without knowing how

2.2.24  2:33 pm   Am I insane or does fly around sound like stars spilling from a glass of milk onto a sky made of sand (genuine question)

      that sounds about right. you might be insane also, regardless

2.2.24  1:27 pm   Why does something always have to go wrong

      to pave the way for things going right in the future

2.2.24  11:58 am   whats your favourite word in dutch

      herinneringen

2.2.24  11:30 am   what do you think of the spelling of February

      it's fine, but sometimes people cheat a little with the pronunciation

2.2.24  8:19 am   Do you believe in weather controlling groundhogs?

      i believe the weather controls the groundhogs, which may or may not have been what you meant, pending different interpretations of the grammar

2.2.24  8:06 am   Do you bother remembering and interpreting dreams, or is that too much fuss for you?

      sometimes i do indeed partake in such fuss

2.2.24  8:05 am   Why did you mention Pyongyang in "Hello Sexy Pants" if you know that North Korea/ns hate/s us.

      that position in the melody is reserved for the 'twist' (as it was so in the previous verse). this second verse is about making friends. so the twist line sends it to the #1 most diplomatically inaccessible place for us. then try to make friends. it's global diplomatic friendship, heightened to the maximum challenge level, in a singular moment. with kindness

2.2.24  7:55 am   Are you, or were you? Will you be?

      yes to all, actually

2.2.24  7:40 am   are we real

      yes

2.2.24  6:50 am   what would a condescending disguise be like?

      disguising yourself as the person you're talking to

2.2.24  6:07 am   How deep are anthills typically?

      i assume they go all the way to the center of the earth

2.2.24  2:39 am   has this question been asked before

      yes

2.2.24  12:38 am   what's your opinion on the public?

      open to new ideas, not stubborn,

2.2.24  12:21 am   how much pizazz is too much?

      anything more than the recommended dose of 1 unit

2.2.24  12:08 am   favorite movie and if you made one what would the concept be?

      to explore what can be done in the movies

2.1.24  11:38 pm   Do you punch mountains

      no

2.1.24  11:00 pm   what are some ways to better remember that I asked you a question and what exactly it is? As when ever i put a question here 4 out of 7 times i forget what it was.

      was it this one

2.1.24  10:09 pm   why do people tell me it's impossible to master music?

      probably just making small talk

2.1.24  8:29 pm   can corn be made of rocks if i try hard enough

      i think so

2.1.24  7:55 pm   Why did you choose to start making music?

      how could i not

2.1.24  7:48 pm   Do you like eggs?

      i like the shape of eggs

2.1.24  6:16 pm   how do you manage to make your videos sound so nonsensical yet coherent at the same time

      as long as i can keep track of the net result of how the sum total of the video so far is feeling, then there is a fresh new opportunity for sense at each moment

2.1.24  5:31 pm   why does every song i make feel forced?

     maybe you actually are forcing it

      how do i stop this from happening?

     one of the standard ways is to try to do something bad on purpose

2.1.24  4:53 pm   how do i feel like my life is as good as othors

      if only someone would reveal the secret to you, that other people are just as jealous of you as you are of them

2.1.24  3:59 pm   do you have any acting tips (i am in a play.)?

      see if you can trick the other actors into believing that you are actually saying the things you're saying, for real. use the same part of your brain you use when you're in real life, saying real things to someone and trying to get them to believe you

2.1.24  3:48 pm   i've got all the wrong ideas

      that sounds very exciting

2.1.24  3:22 pm   am I cool?

      i don't see why not

2.1.24  2:23 pm   How can you make friends as a grown up?

      how about doing business

2.1.24  1:30 pm   Why is it so hard for people to understand art

      it's actually so easy that they're not even aware that they are understanding anything. kind of like diphthongs. you hear them, you comprehend them, you use them. but you might not even be aware of it

2.1.24  1:12 pm   what does the corn symbolize in "2 friends on the beach". it leaves me nonplussed.

      it's not symbolism. it's an opportunity to explore what would and would not be, and why

2.1.24  12:21 pm   opinion on baguettes?

      i have no idea what size they actually are. i think no matter what size they are, it would surprise me

2.1.24  12:00 pm   Can I make everything go slower

      i don't think so

2.1.24  11:31 am   is sleep actually important?

      i don't know but it's pretty much impossible to avoid it anyway

2.1.24  11:12 am   Why is it febuary

      they ran out of other months

2.1.24  10:22 am   are you ever doing something then ask why you're doing it, which snowballs into a bigger "why is everything," but you don't actually ask it, your feeling sort of indicates it, and then you feel completely free for a second, until something else happens, and then it's gone? this happens in the course of one second to me by the way

      yes that seems normal

2.1.24  9:49 am   what do you think about eternity?

      it makes a lot of things possible that otherwise wouldn't be

2.1.24  8:09 am   how do you push past the songwriting stage of "i wrote this riff/line/jam and it sounds good but i can't shake this feeling that somebody else wrote this somewhere else and i just recreated it by ear", or does it not bother you because every note has already been used in some context or another

      if it feels too much like something that's been done before, then i'll take some extra steps to throw it further outside the box. with passion -- not with reluctance. if it's done doubtfully then that would just take away what's good about it. instead, eagerly slam it into outboxlyness

2.1.24  7:36 am   If Mt St Helens is filled with music (like in the song) and lasagna contains magma (an answer here from several months ago), music is the most appealing and logical pizza topping option, for sure, agreed.

      i wonder what else would happen if you took everything in the songs and on the questions page as facts

2.1.24  7:22 am   is comic sans a font you use in the future

      i will continue to use it occasionally as long as it's available. it's become such a cornerstone of our society that it inevitably will come up from time to time, in one way or another

2.1.24  2:39 am   all the keys on the keyboard scare me, so many i could play and i cannot begin to play them, too many choices. how to overcome my fear of the keyboard?

      try not playing it. see if that is more scary

2.1.24  1:02 am   thoughts on the future?

      couldn't even imagine it, but i suppose i will anyway

2.1.24  12:50 am   do you think one way to break out of duality is to view everythings duality?

      i think that might just get you into an even more dual mood

2.1.24  12:32 am   when asked about your favorite thing about a subject, you always say something like "i don't know it yet" or "i hope to find out in the future" and stuff. what if you've already found your favorite? or do you think there's intrinsic value to having this mindset of always wanting to be "surprised" and hoping that something will always surpass the current expectations you have

personally, i've always enjoyed pointing out parts of my life that are dearest to me, and kinda putting them in this special place in my mind above everything else, like favorite songs and stuff. but the way you seem to approach it also seems interesting, maybe.

      the most distinctive aspect of life is that it continues on, and reveals new and different things. maybe when it's over i'll vote for some favorites, but as long as it continues i would like to continue playing

2.1.24  12:02 am   how to fall asleep when stressed/excited/scared/all of the above

      i have no idea





PREVIOUS QUESTIONS

1.31.24  11:53 pm   do you feel like doing anything?

      yes

1.31.24  11:42 pm   what are some things to do with a kind-hearted brick wall

      find a bright new direction to go
